comments.text: oh wow this is best one of these that Ive seen! Perfect!

I LOVE THIS! reminds me of 28dayslater & the walking dead opeing scenes!
Btw don't reply to those bots asking you to DM them for their inquiries. It's scam!

Hello mate!!! Sorry for the random approach I found your profile on explore, From what I can see you have some clean artwork pictures, I would love to buy some collections of your artwork's as an NFT...kindly send me a DM if you're interested.
Hello.. sorry for the random approach, I find your artwork amazing. I will like to purchase your art work for my NFT COLLECTION, kindly send me a DM or stay blissful
